body_html: A work-around I found is to manually register each module by calling add_module. Though, this can work, but this breaks consistency. It'll be better if we need to add_module everything manually, or add_module is done automatically even if the module is not a direct child.
body_text: A work-around I found is to manually register each module by calling add_module. Though, this can work, but this breaks consistency. It'll be better if we need to add_module everything manually, or add_module is done automatically even if the module is not a direct child.
body: A work-around I found is to manually register each module by calling `add_module`. Though, this can work, but this breaks consistency. It'll be better if we need to `add_module` everything manually, or `add_module` is done automatically even if the module is not a direct child.
